00020 template <class T>
00021 struct PanelTraits {
00022     static const int32_t value = 1;
00023 };
00024 
00025 struct NullPanel {
00026     class Handler {
00027     };
00028     static Handler *createHandler() { return new Handler; }
00029 };
00030 
00031 template <>
00032 struct PanelTraits<NullPanel> {
00033     static const int32_t value = 0;
00034 };

00038 #define UNUSED(x) x __attribute__((unused))

00040 // -----------------------------------------------------------
00041 //          ListItem Combo
00042 // -----------------------------------------------------------
00043 template <class Panel1, class Panel2,
00044          class Panel3, class Panel4, class Panel5>
00045 class ListItem: public gaia::ui::LinearController {
00046   public: /* Public member functions declaration */
00047     // Ctors/Dtors
00048     explicit ListItem(gaia::core::Page *pPage);
00049     explicit ListItem(gaia::core::Context *pContext);
00050     virtual ~ListItem();
00052 
00053     // Getter functions
00055     void getHandler(typename Panel1::Handler **pHandler);
00056     void getHandler(typename Panel2::Handler **pHandler);
00057     void getHandler(typename Panel3::Handler **pHandler);
00058     void getHandler(typename Panel4::Handler **pHandler);
00059     void getHandler(typename Panel5::Handler **pHandler);
00061 
00062     USING_OVERLOADING_FUNC(gaia::core::WidgetController::addWidget);
00063 
00064   protected: /* Protected member functions declaration */
00065     template <class PanelType>
00066     typename PanelType::Handler *addWidget(PanelTraits<PanelType> traits,
00067             gaia::core::Page *pPage);
00068 
00069     NullPanel::Handler *addWidget(PanelTraits<NullPanel> traits,
00070             gaia::core::Page *pPage);
00071 
00072     NullPanel::Handler *addWidget(PanelTraits<NullPanel> traits,
00073             gaia::core::Context *pContext);
00074 
00075     template <class PanelType>
00076     typename PanelType::Handler *addWidget(PanelTraits<PanelType> traits,
00077             gaia::core::Context *pContext);
00078 
00079   protected: /* Protected members declaration */
00080     typename Panel1::Handler *mpPanel1Handler;
00081     typename Panel2::Handler *mpPanel2Handler;
00082     typename Panel3::Handler *mpPanel3Handler;
00083     typename Panel4::Handler *mpPanel4Handler;
00084     typename Panel5::Handler *mpPanel5Handler;
00085     DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(ListItem);
00086 };

00088 #define CLASS_TEMPLATE \
00089 template <class Panel1, class Panel2, \
00090          class Panel3, class Panel4, class Panel5>
00091 
00092 #define PANELS Panel1, Panel2, Panel3, Panel4, Panel5
00093 
00094 CLASS_TEMPLATE
00095 ListItem<PANELS>::ListItem(gaia::core::Page *pPage)
00096     : LinearController(pPage) {
00097     setOrientation(LinearController::HORIZONTAL);
00098     mpPanel1Handler = addWidget(PanelTraits<Panel1>(), pPage);
00099     mpPanel2Handler = addWidget(PanelTraits<Panel2>(), pPage);
00100     mpPanel3Handler = addWidget(PanelTraits<Panel3>(), pPage);
00101     mpPanel4Handler = addWidget(PanelTraits<Panel4>(), pPage);
00102     mpPanel5Handler = addWidget(PanelTraits<Panel5>(), pPage);
00103 }
00104 
00105 CLASS_TEMPLATE
00106 ListItem<PANELS>::ListItem(gaia::core::Context *pContext)
00107     : LinearController(pContext) {
00108     setOrientation(LinearController::HORIZONTAL);
00109     mpPanel1Handler = addWidget(PanelTraits<Panel1>(), pContext);
00110     mpPanel2Handler = addWidget(PanelTraits<Panel2>(), pContext);
00111     mpPanel3Handler = addWidget(PanelTraits<Panel3>(), pContext);
00112     mpPanel4Handler = addWidget(PanelTraits<Panel4>(), pContext);
00113     mpPanel5Handler = addWidget(PanelTraits<Panel5>(), pContext);
00114 }
00115 
00116 CLASS_TEMPLATE
00117 ListItem<PANELS>::~ListItem() {
00118     int32_t childCount = getChildCount();
00119     gaia::core::Widget *pWidget;
00120     for (int32_t i = 0; i < childCount; i++) {
00121         pWidget = getChildWidget(i);
00122         delete pWidget;
00123     }
00124     delete mpPanel1Handler;
00125     delete mpPanel2Handler;
00126     delete mpPanel3Handler;
00127     delete mpPanel4Handler;
00128     delete mpPanel5Handler;
00129 }

00131 CLASS_TEMPLATE
00132 template <class PanelType>
00133 typename PanelType::Handler *
00134 ListItem<PANELS>::addWidget(PanelTraits<PanelType> UNUSED(traits),
00135         gaia::core::Page *pPage) {
00136     gaia::core::Widget *pWidget = PanelType::createWidget(pPage);
00137     if (pWidget != NULL) {
00138         LinearController::addWidget(pWidget);
00139     }
00140     return PanelType::createHandler(pWidget);
00141 }

00147         gaia::core::Context *pContext) {
00148     gaia::core::Widget *pWidget = PanelType::createWidget(pContext);
00149     if (pWidget != NULL) {
00150         LinearController::addWidget(pWidget);
00151     }
00152     return PanelType::createHandler(pWidget);
00153 }

00157         PanelTraits<NullPanel> UNUSED(traits),
00158         gaia::core::Page *UNUSED(pPage)) {
00159     return NullPanel::createHandler();
